x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | ringcbasOLD.c | |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |

| 4 |  | ringchomfvalOLD.h | |- H = ( Hom ` C ) |

| 6 |  | ringchomOLD.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_ringchomfvalOLD | |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x RingHom y ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( x RingHom y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( x RingHom y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X RingHom Y ) e. _V |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( X RingHom Y ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 7, 9, 5, 6, 11 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ph -> ( X H Y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
